name: BEAR YOURSELF
description:
In this game you will experience the Backrooms, you must survive and get to the end to fight the ultimate foe

///LOUD SOUND WARNING/// Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • K - Attack
  • L-  Blink - Select
Credits

The game was developped for the Ynov JAM 2022 event .
